Peoria.North Pointe Preparatory:
North Pointe Preparatory is a public charter school located in Phoenix, Arizona that serves students in grades 7 through 12.


== History ==
North Pointe Preparatory was established in August 2001, with 130 students in grades 7 through 9. In eight years, it grew to its current maximum enrollment of 750 students in grades 7 through 12.
